Abstract method which must be implemented by derived classes.

Parameters:
component Component, which contains the data needed for drawing.
dc Pointer to the device context for drawing.
repaint_rect Bounding rectangle which describes the area, which must be repainted. For less complex drawing operations, this parameter can be ignored.
